lead_paragraph: MILWAUKEE — No sense trying to hide the obvious. The Milwaukee Brewers’ interim manager, Dale Sveum, with his team suddenly and improbably back in the National League wild-card race, acknowledged before Thursday’s game with Pittsburgh that he constantly checked out-of-town scores while the Brewers were playing.
